TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NetNamedPipeBinding extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences
Public Class NetNamedPipeBinding Inherits Binding Implements IBindingRuntimePreferences
type NetNamedPipeBinding = class inherit Binding interface IBindingRuntimePreferences

summary.span: 提供針對電腦通訊最佳化，安全而可靠的繫結。

span.span: Provides a secure and reliable binding that is optimized for on-machine communication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設， 會產生執行階段通訊堆疊，此堆疊使用傳輸安全性、具名管道 (用於訊息傳遞) 和二進位訊息編碼。The generates a run-time communication stack by default, which uses transport security, named pipes for message delivery, and a binary message encoding. 此繫結為適當的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 系統提供的現成選擇，可用於電腦通訊。This binding is an appropriate Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) system-provided choice for on-machine communication. 它也支援交易。It also supports transactions. 的預設組態類似於 所提供的組態，但較為簡單，因為 WCF 實作只針對電腦應用，所以公開的功能不多。The default configuration for the is similar to the configuration provided by the , but it is simpler because the WCF implementation is only meant for on-machine use and consequently there are fewer exposed features. 最顯著的差異在於， 設定只提供 和 選項。The most notable difference is that the setting only offers the and options. SOAP 安全性支援並非包含的選項。SOAP security support is not an included option. 您可以使用建構函式 `securityMode` 中的選擇性 參數，設定安全性行為。The security behavior is configurable using the optional `securityMode` parameter in the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例會示範部分組態檔，其中包含值設為預設值之 的區段。The following example shows the part of the configuration file that contains the section for the with values set to defaults. 下列範例會示範如何以程式設計的方式使用 類別。The following example shows how to programmatically use the class. [!code-csharp[S_UENetNamedPipe#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetnamedpipe/cs/service.cs#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定記憶體中用於緩衝傳入訊息的位元組數目上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory.

value.span: 記憶體中用於緩衝傳入訊息的位元組數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory.

value.span: 預設值為 524,288 個位元組。

span.span: The default value is 524,288 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您接收超出可以緩衝的資料，則超出緩衝大小的資料會保留在基礎通訊端中，直到緩衝區再度有空間可存放其他資料為止。If you receive more data than you can buffer, the data that exceeds the buffer size remains on the underlying socket until your buffer has room for the rest of the data. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 值。The following example shows how to get the value. [!code-csharp[S_UENetNamedPipe#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetnamedpipe/cs/service.cs#5)]

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections, both inbound and outbound, that are allowed to endpoints configured with the named pipe binding.

value.span: 預設值為 10。

span.span: The default value is 10.

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 訊息複雜性的條件約束，而這些條件約束可由以此繫結所設定的端點處理。

span.span: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: ，指定已交換之 SOAP 訊息的複雜度條件約束。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints on SOAP messages exchanged.

value.span: 接下來的「備註」一節提供了這些條件約束的預設值。

span.span: The default values for these constraints are provided in the following Remarks section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複雜性條件約束可以防止嘗試使用訊息複雜性困住端點處理資源的阻絕服務 (DOS) 攻擊類別。The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表示這些條件約束及其預設值的屬性包括：The properties that express these constraints and their default values are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384 ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何取得 物件。The following example shows how to get the object. [!code-csharp[S_UENetNamedPipe#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetnamedpipe/cs/service.cs#11)]

span.span: The value set is .
